snippet: On Tuesday, testimony from soldiers who served under General Sinclair described his strong leadership, but upon cross-examination, a prosecutor described a vulgar farewell skit that suggests sexual misconduct.
abstract: Testimony from soldiers who served under Brig Gen Jeffrey A Sinclair describe his strong leadership, but upon cross-examination, prosecutor describes vulgar skit at farewell party that suggests sexual misconduct; Sinclair has pleaded guilty to range of lesser charges in exchange for dismissal of sexual assault charges.
lead_paragraph: On Tuesday, testimony from soldiers who served under General Sinclair described his strong leadership, but upon cross-examination, a prosecutor described a vulgar farewell skit that suggests sexual misconduct.

headline.main: Raunchy Skit Described in General’s Court-Martial
headline.print_headline: Raunchy Skit Described in General’s Court-Martial
